mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, train_no, train_title, train_count, train_url_img FROM (SELECT * FROM train ORDER BY train_COUNT DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, train_no, train_title, user_id, train_content, train_url, train_url_img, train_date,train_count FROM (SELECT * FROM train order by train_no desc)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into train (train_no, user_id, train_title, train_content, train_date, train_count, train_url, train_url_img) values ((select max(train_no) + 1 from train), #{user_id}, #{train_title}, #{train_content}, sysdate, 0, #{train_url}, #{train_url_img})
mapper.update: update train set train_count = train_count + 1 where train_no = #{train_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, train_no, train_TITLE, user_id, train_CONTENT, train_url, train_url_img, train_DATE, train_count FROM(select * from train where train_title like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%')) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
SELECT count(*) from train where train_title like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, train_no, train_TITLE, user_id, train_CONTENT, train_url, train_url_img, train_DATE,train_count FROM(select * from train where user_id like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%')) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
select count(*) from train where user_id like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, train_no, train_TITLE, user_id, train_CONTENT, train_url, train_url_img, train_DATE, train_count FROM(select * from train where train_date between #{ begin } and #{ end })) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
